trans-unit.source: The base class for all objects that have dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: A classe base de todos os objetos que têm propriedades de dependência.

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe deve ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa o valor dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In this case, a <see cref="T:System.Delegate" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, um tipo <see cref="T:System.Delegate" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for an event of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador para um evento de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado, você pode identificar o método que manipula o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A menos que você remova o representante, o manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Multiple delegates can be added to handle an event.
trans-unit.target: Vários representantes podem ser adicionados para manipular um evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Handlers are added and removed using the following code.
trans-unit.target: Manipuladores são adicionados e removidos usando o código a seguir.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Send Email SDK sample and is from the SendMailActivity.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo Enviar Email SDK e do arquivo de SendMailActivity.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Send Email Activity Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [enviar exemplo de atividade de Email](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).

trans-unit.source: Either of the arguments is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um dos argumentos é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> represents a non-event <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> representa uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> não evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that indicates whether this instance is in design or run-time mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor que indica se esta instância está em modo de design ou de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance is in design mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se esta instância está no modo de design; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pela classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados e opcionalmente os gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Provided as an override to <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> to clean up any unmanaged resources deterministically.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido como uma substituição para <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> para limpar todos os recursos não gerenciados de forma determinística.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is required only when unmanaged resources such as raw HWNDS, Win32 files handlers, and others are released.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso é necessário somente quando os manipuladores de arquivos de recursos não gerenciados, como HWNDS bruto, Win32, e outros são liberados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> associated with the specific <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso para ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> específico.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> associated with the specific <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> específico.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do destino do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the subject of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é a entidade de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the subject of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é a entidade de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the subject of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object> que é a entidade de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method can be used to customize the way in which a specified binding is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, esse método pode ser usado para personalizar a maneira em que uma associação especificada é resolvida.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetType" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetType" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned delegates.
trans-unit.target: O tipo retornado delegados.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array that contains the delegates for the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz que contém os delegados para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the delegates for the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz que contém os delegados para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> does not correspond to an event.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> não corresponde a um evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the value of the designated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso ao valor do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> designado.

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the value of the designated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que representa o valor do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> designado.

trans-unit.source: This member is typically used in property gets to furnish the value of the named dependency value.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse membro é usado na propriedade obtém para fornecer o valor de dependência nomeada.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> to return the value represented by a named dependency property in the context of get and set.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como usar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> para retornar o valor representado por uma propriedade de dependência nomeada no contexto de get e set.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Send Email SDK sample and is from the SendMailActivity.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo Enviar Email SDK e do arquivo de SendMailActivity.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Send Email Activity Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [enviar exemplo de atividade de Email](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to get the value of.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> cujo valor obter.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the bound object of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> and bypasses the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty)" /> override.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso ao objeto associado de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> e ignora a substituição de <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty)" />.

trans-unit.source: The bound object of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto associado de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: This bypasses the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty)" /> override.
trans-unit.target: Isso ignora a substituição de <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty)" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil dentro de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> substituir a implementação.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override code invokes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValueBase%2A>, and then adds additional code.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> substituir o código invoca o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValueBase%2A>e, em seguida, adiciona o código adicional.

trans-unit.source: For implementing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>/<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> substituir, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> pode ser usado em <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> / <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> chamadas.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs initialization on dependency properties when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Executa a inicialização nas propriedades de dependência quando substituído em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine during the initialization of the activity at run time.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho durante a inicialização da atividade em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the value of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> is set as a binding.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o valor de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> é definido como uma associação.

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind)" />.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if set as a binding; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se definido como uma associação; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> to compare with for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> a ser comparado quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see langword="metaproperties" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> equals the <see langword="metaproperties" /> of the parameterized <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see langword="metaproperties" /> deste <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> é igual a <see langword="metaproperties" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> com parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="metaproperties" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see langword="metaproperties" /> forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This uses the `==` operator as defined for the type of private member `metaproperties`, which is <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Isso usa o `==` operador conforme definido para o tipo de membro particular `metaproperties`, que é <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> graph.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> pai no grafo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> graph.
trans-unit.target: O pai <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> gráfico.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa o valor dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In this case, a <see cref="T:System.Delegate" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, um tipo <see cref="T:System.Delegate" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes an <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> from an associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove um <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: Provided as a convenient direct method for removing an event delegate.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido como um método conveniente para a remoção de um representante do evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado, você pode identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A menos que você remova o representante, o manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Handlers are added and removed using the following code.
trans-unit.target: Manipuladores são adicionados e removidos usando o código a seguir.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Send Email Activity Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [enviar exemplo de atividade de Email](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).

trans-unit.source: Either of the arguments is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um dos argumentos é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> is not an event.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="dependencyEvent" /> não é um evento.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> and this instance is not in <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="value" /> é um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> e essa instância não está em <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if operation was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a operação tiver sido bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The argument is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O argumento é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> to set to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> para o qual definir.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> sets the value directly to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> Define o valor diretamente para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adds a handler directly to properties of type event.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adiciona um manipulador diretamente às propriedades de evento de tipo.

trans-unit.source: These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property.
trans-unit.target: Esses métodos são exclusivos quando eles são chamados para a mesma propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> is called, then the values previously set using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> in events) are disregarded.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> é chamado, os valores definidos anteriormente usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> em eventos) são desconsiderados.

trans-unit.source: The same is true the other way around: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) resets the binding assigned with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo é verdadeiro o oposto: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) redefine a associação atribuída com <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and includes setting the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.CanModifyActivities%2A> permission for this type.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como criar atividades e adicioná-los como filhos a uma atividade composta e inclui a configuração de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.CanModifyActivities%2A> permissão para este tipo.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the use of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> method is illustrated.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o uso do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> método é ilustrado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo Throw SDK e do arquivo de ThrowWorkFlow.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Throw](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando Throw](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc).

trans-unit.source: Either of the arguments is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um dos argumentos é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> is not bindable.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata" /> associado com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> não é associável.

trans-unit.source: This instance is not in <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode" />.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância não está em <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to set the target of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> para definir o destino do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the target <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bind" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bind" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa o valor.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />, which is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />, que é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="Nothing" /> é uma referência nula (<paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to be set.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to set the value to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> cujo valor definir.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to the object.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> sets a binding for the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> define uma associação para a propriedade de dependência.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> sets a value directly to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> (similarly, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adds a handler directly to properties of type event).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> define um valor diretamente para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> (da mesma forma, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adiciona um manipulador diretamente às propriedades de evento de tipo).

trans-unit.source: These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property.
trans-unit.target: Esses métodos são exclusivos quando eles são chamados para a mesma propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> is called, then the values previously set using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> in events) are disregarded.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> é chamado, os valores definidos anteriormente usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> em eventos) são desconsiderados.

trans-unit.source: The same is true the other way around: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) resets the binding assigned with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo é verdadeiro o oposto: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) redefine a associação atribuída com <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how a dependency property is set within a dependency object using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como uma propriedade de dependência é definida dentro de um objeto de dependência usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to be set to the <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> a ser definido para o <see cref="T:System.Object" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that becomes the value of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que se torna o valor do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" />, bypassing the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> especificado, ignorando o <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty,System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil dentro de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> substituir a implementação.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override code would do some custom logic before calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValueBase%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> substituição código faria alguma lógica personalizada antes de chamar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValueBase%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: For setting a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Para configuração de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> substituir, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> pode ser usado em <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>, ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> chamadas.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyProperty" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Site" /> component of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma referência ao componente <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Site" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Site" /> component of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Site" /> componente do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that associates custom data with this class instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que associa dados personalizados a essa instância de classe.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that acts as an extensibility hook for developers to manipulate <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> declarations for a design tool and associate custom data with individual activity declarations.
trans-unit.target: Um dicionário que atua como um gancho de extensibilidade para desenvolvedores manipular <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> declarações para um design de ferramenta e associar dados personalizados a declarações de atividades individuais.

trans-unit.source: This property is a `metaproperty`, which means it is immutable at run time.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é um `metaproperty`, que significa que ele é imutável em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: `Metaproperties` do not change after a property instance is created at run time, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time.
trans-unit.target: `Metaproperties` Não altere o após uma instância de propriedade é criada em tempo de execução para a propriedade deve ser definida como um valor literal em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This property is not used in the default <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> declaration implementations provided by Windows Workflow Foundation.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é usada no padrão <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> implementações de declaração fornecidas pelo Windows Workflow Foundation.

trans-unit.source: This collection is not serialized; data that the collection contains is not persisted from design time to run time.
trans-unit.target: Esta coleção não é serializada; dados que contém a coleção não são persistidos de tempo de design para tempo de execução.
